resources.string: NOTE: A google map link to your location will be appended to the above message

Your one click emergency application.
 With a single click, it sends a SMS to your contact with a link to your current location.

 Features:-

 (1) Very fast and accurate in sending your location
 (2) Can send multiple SMSes to a contact, updating him of your changing location
 (3) Works even without internet connection or GPS, giving your best accurate location.
 (4) Sends a map link which can be opened by any browser supporting phone/system

 Your life is very precious. When it comes to danger or emergencies we leave no stones unturned.
